title: National debt of India 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the national debt of france from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , the national debt of france amounted to around 2.55 trillion u.s. dollars . For comparison , the Greek debt amounted to approximately 360 billion euros that same year .
gold: In 2018 , the national debt of India amounted to around 1.8 trillion U.S. dollars . Projections show an upward trend , with a significant increase each year . Honor thy national debt National debt , also called government debt or public debt , is money owed by the federal government .
